330 Has Anyone Noticed the Media Ignores Susie Wiles? posted 9 hours ago by flashersenpai 47 comments award share report block Suntanned Greek Immigrant @GreekNME • 1d Susie Wiles is not in the news at all unlike any of the past Trump chief of staffs, which means the swamp in DC via its  DC press handmaidens views her as an ally.
47 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Reveals the Real Reason He Walks Away From Trump Read More Ads by Ad.Style nuhbin3 23 points 9 hours ago stop noticing!!!!!!!!! just enjoy your Chinese student visas, Indian truck drivers, greater Israel project and 50yr mortgages and when Republicans lose the next election just blame Tucker Carlson like a good boy ok! permalink award report block reply MastaJoda 9 points 8 hours ago ☝We are here, while Trump is sucking off terrorists in the White House and bailing out Argentinean farmers while American farmers struggle to operate and compete with foriegn competitors that are sponsored by our own govt. Wake tf up, cultists!!! permalink parent award report block reply BBvarn 1 points 5 hours ago Liberal Female Bot site, I am heading to the real Donald/win site. permalink parent award report block reply Mhmm2MoreWeeks -2 points 59 minutes ago Actually the JEW HATERS are PRECISELY the way to undermine MAGA in the next election and its working. Normies want nothing to do with Racists, and quietly run away. Just like this website, it used to be amazing. Upvoted stickies to 5000++ but today, as always happens with Jew Hater sites, its a fraction of that, and a Jew Hate echo chamber like a 4Chan or Gab. You fool yourselves into thinking you have numbers enough to matter but do not. What you all are really is a useful idiot of your political foes who control you by race the same way a Prison Warden controls a prison by race. YOU ARE UNDER CONTROL. It does not matter if you think so or not as it is self evident. Your emotions and hate are the levers your enemies use to steer you, and you will never ever learn. permalink parent award report block reply flashersenpai OP 18 points 9 hours ago Compare her treatment to the treatment of RFK, Hegseth, Gaetz, or Tulsi.
